name: Addermarch Campaign - Session 9
tagline: in which the party befriends a kobold inventor and defeats a cave fisher
shortSummary: Still in the West Stonewolds Caves, the party discovers a mushroom farm, recovers more uligium, meets kobold inventor Zibzig Sparkscale, and defeats a cave fisher blocking his river passage.
longSummary: Continuing from their battles with oozes, Drou, Fazoth, and Yvan explore deeper into the West Stonewolds Caves and trigger a floor collapse that reveals a mushroom-lit farm below. After scouting with the pseudodragon, they slide down flowstone to investigate, finding rows of cultivated fungi and shrieker mushrooms that act as living alarms, as well as a tunnel leading toward an underground river. In a large oblong cavern, Yvan discovers a high crawlspace that ends in a poisoned pocket rich with uligium; Fazoth climbs with rope and, with Drou's unseen servant, they safely retrieve the mineral. Later they become lost in twisting passages until confronted by a booming voice claiming the home of the 'Master of Light and Shadow', who proves to be Zibzig Sparkscale, a kobold inventor eager to test his devices. Learning that a cave fisher blocks Zibzig's access to the river, the party agrees to help and quickly slays the crab-like predator by dodging its snare and striking from range, then spend the night resting in Zibzig's cozy, gadget-filled lair.
